title: Capacity-Building Program for Primary Mathematics Tutoring in Timor-Leste

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary arithmetic skills and Tetum language communication proficiency
context.additional_context: Strengthening local tutors' capabilities in Timor-Leste through smartphone-based learning in limited technological environments

learning_goals: Apply at least three small-group tutoring strategies using customized math worksheets in Tetum
Interpret diagnostic assessment tools with 90% accuracy to analyze students' math achievement gaps
Design five or more interactive mobile learning activities specialized for statistics and geometry support

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
